Job.Command:
gunzip wab.lhe.gz sed -i 's/\([:blank:]*\)622 /\1 22 /' wab.lhe gzip wab.lhe
echo "Auger ID: $AUGER_ID" set dz = `${param_dir}/dz.csh ${ebeam}` set ne = `${param_dir}/ne.csh ${ebeam}` set ebeam = `${param_dir}/ebeam.csh ${ebeam}` set mu=`/u/group/hps/production/mc/MadGraph/mu.csh $dz $ne wab.lhe.gz`
echo "mu=$mu dz=$dz ne=$ne ebeam=$ebeam"
echo "Unpacking Wide-Angle Bremsstralung events" zcat wab.lhe.gz > egs5job.inp ln -s ${egs5_dir}/data ln -s ${exe_dir}/src/esa.inp pgs5job.pegs5inp echo "11${num} $dz $ebeam 500000" > seed.dat ${exe_dir}/lhe_v1.exe cat egs5job.out
echo "Rotating Wide-Angle Bremsstrahlung events, and offsetting target -5mm" ${stdhep_dir}/beam_coords brems.stdhep rot_wab.stdhep -s 22${num} -z -5.0
setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH bash -c 'source ${slic_dir}/init_ilcsoft.sh; exec csh' source ${slic_dir}/geant4/build-10.01.p03/geant4make.csh ${slic_dir}/geant4/build-10.01.p03 setenv GDML_SCHEMA_DIR "/u/group/hps/hps_soft/slic/schemas" ln -s /u/group/hps/hps_soft/fieldmaps fieldmap
set seed = 18 echo "slic -i rot_wab.stdhep -g ${det_dir}/${detector}/${detector}.lcdd -o out.slcio -d$seed{${num}} -r5000000" ${slic_dir}/slic/v05-00-01/bin/slic -P /u/group/hps/hps_soft/slic/REL/slic/v05-00-01/data/particle.tbl -i rot_wab.stdhep -g ${det_dir}/${detector}/${detector}.lcdd -o out.slcio -d$seed{${num}} -r5000000|grep -vE '^$|^>>>> .+Event <[0-9]+>$| has [0-9]+ hits$' ls -ltrh
